channel.title: Shari Redstone on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Shari Redstone on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Shari Redstone Says She Is “Forever Grateful” to Paramount Staff and Shareholders, as Company Releases Earnings Ahead of Skydance Deal
item.description: David Ellison and his leadership team will take over the company next week, inheriting “a healthy business with a strong foundation,” Redstone says.
